file_content.text: Jakarro. Deefour.
It is about time! I thought maybe you got lost!
Jakarro! Display at least a modicum of respect!
At last! Now that you're here, vengeance can be ours!
Hey. We're set to move on the Temple of the Ancients when you are.
That's the traitors' base of operations?
Yeah. The Rakata designed the Star Forge in that temple thousands of years ago. Now it's Arkous and Darok's grunt factory.
Theron and I will be monitoring your progress from Jakarro's ship. We'll assist you as we can, keep you apprised of matters.
And I will go ahead of you to make destruction and draw enemy fire!
And I still want revenge against my former captors, so I will join you!
You'll what?! Jakarro, I agreed to no such thing! Wait, was this the talk with Agent Shan you powered me down for?
Shut up, droid, or you will be turned off for good!
Should warn you, it's a rough road to the temple. The area's lousy with tribal Rakatans more than happy to fight. Found that out the hard way....
Wonderful. We're all going to die. Wonderful!
Remain focused and all will be well. I'm sure of it. We'll be in touch soon.
I want my revenge, and I want it now!
Do we have a plan ready?
I don't know if it's fair to describe it as a "plan", necessarily....
Quiet, droid!
I've done a bit of scouting. The Revanites are camped in the Temple of the Ancients, an old ruin nearby.
We will fight side-by-side, annihilating all who try to oppose us until Colonel Darok and Darth Arkous lie dead!
Since you are not quite as fearsome as the mighty Jakarro, I will act as diversion, drawing the enemy away while you approach the Temple.
What? This isn't what we discussed! It's suicide! I demand that you detach me this instant!
You will join the rest of your body soon enough if you won't be silent!
What kind of security do the Revanites have?
They've convinced some of the local Rakatan tribes to patrol the areas around the temple for them. A truly barbaric lot.
The Revanites themselves are guarding the temple grounds. They're fully armed and paranoid.
Wonderful....
We'll be keeping an eye on things from the ship. As long as we all stay sharp, we'll get this conspiracy shut down permanently.
May the Force serve you well.
We've gotten this far without being detected--it's time for you to go in and make some noise.
